caption: Derrick Harvey
infobox-image: Color photo of African-American football player Derrick Harvey in the white, navy blue and orange uniform of the Denver Broncos, standing on the side of a playing field with his helmet off. | Harvey in 2011

Career history: Jacksonville Jaguars (2008-2010) | Denver Broncos (2011) | Cincinnati Bengals (2012)*
* Offseason and/or practice squad member only

Career highlights and awards: BCS national champion (2007) | BCS National Championship Game MVP (2007) | 2× Second-team All-SEC (2006, 2007)
